summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Wedding Gift Collection Pots web app. Backend APIs working well (92% success rate). Frontend UI loads correctly with proper wedding theme and navigation. Identified cart functionality issue where floating cart button doesn't appear consistently despite items being added successfully.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Returns CSV content but test expects JSON, causing parsing error
flaky_endpoints.impact: Minor - functionality works but test parsing fails

ui_bugs.issue: Floating cart button doesn't appear on homepage after adding items to cart, despite cart state being updated correctly

integration_issues.issue: Items are added to cart (success toast appears) but floating cart button doesn't show

design_issues.issue: Admin pots and contributions pages show loading spinners instead of content

passed_tests: Homepage loads with wedding header showing 'Shvetha & Aadi'
3 pot cards displayed correctly (kitchen, honeymoon, dream-home)
Pot detail pages load with progress bars and items
Admin dashboard loads with stats cards
All pot endpoints return correct data
Session creation and Razorpay order creation working
Add to cart shows success toast notification

high_priority: Fix floating cart button not appearing issue - cart state updates but UI doesn't show the cart button
Fix admin pots and contributions pages showing loading state instead of data
medium_priority: Verify cart drawer functionality opens correctly when cart button is clicked
low_priority: Fix admin contributions export test parsing (endpoint works but returns CSV not JSON)
